text:
Alessandro Tambellini (born 30 April 1955) is an Italian politician and professor. Tambellini was born in Lucca, Italy. He is member of the Democratic Party. Tambellini was elected Mayor of Lucca on 20 May 2012 and re-elected for the second term on 25 June 2017.
On 10 March 2020 he announced he had tested positive for COVID-19.
